duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the development and implementation of proprietary long DNA synthesis technologies.
Perform molecular biology techniques including molecular cloning, PCR, primer design, DNA assembly approaches, DNA purification, gel electrophoresis, and sequencing data analysis.
Handle bacterial growth and manipulations for cloning.
Contribute to a culture that embraces continuous learning and improvement to meet team goals.
Maintain an electronic lab notebook and ensure excellent organizational and lab management.
Handle high molecular weight DNA, DNA recombineering, CRISPR digestion, yeast and phage biology, and high-throughput experiments.

education_certification.credential: BS or MS in biochemistry or related fields, Industry or academic laboratory experience with standard molecular biology techniques.
